passive.name: Flowers and Butterflies
passive.description: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. While the wearer is in battle, for every <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> SPD that exceeds <unbreak>100</unbreak>, the DMG of the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill is increased by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> and the CRIT DMG of their Ultimate is increased by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>. This effect can stack up to <unbreak>#5[i]</unbreak> time(s).
